name: Disney Big Hero 6: Battle in the Bay
name_original: Disney Big Hero 6: Battle in the Bay
description:
Disney Big Hero 6: Battle in the Bay is an arcade game developed by GameMill Entertainment. It was originally released in 2014. It was published by Avanquest Software. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play Disney Big Hero 6: Battle in the Bay on Nintendo DS and Nintendo 3DS.
It was produced by Kristina Reed and Roy Conli. Chris Williams and Don Hall directed the game. It was scored by Henry Jackman.
